quirk: A strange smelling chicken coop sits off to the side.
The swamp gasses have stained the lower half of each window.
It looks like this inn doesn't see much action.
Gilded eavestroughs make this Inn stand out in the crowded street.
You can see the harbor just down the street from the entrance.
Some sort of strange shrubbery is growing across the stoop.
Icicles large enough to kill a man hang from the eavestroughs.
The next closest building is probably 10 miles away.
Someone started painting the deck out front but the job is only half complete.
This inn only seems to have one window on the ground floor, but it's as big as a horse!
locales: major city, port city, town, desert, mountains, plains, swamp

quirk: The tavern only has one door but it's 15 feet tall!
Red and blue stripes are painted on the walls and ceiling.
Large bay windows greet you as you approach the inn
locales: major city, port city, mountains, plains

quirk: The inn seems to be largest building in town.
The inn stands 20 stories tall and is strangely narrow.
You can't see the inside of the tavern because the windows are filthy.
You can't see the inside of the tavern because the windows are covered in frost.
It looks like someone is repairing the stoop.
This inn is so small it's a wonder anyone can even enter it.
Wild birds are lining the rooftops.
locales: major city, port city, town, mountains

quirk: There is some sort of dog tied up outside.
locales: major city, port city, town, mountains, plains

quirk: There is a strange inscription above the door.
The door seems to open from the bottom up.
Wide panels with sparkling paint line the front wall.
The sign above the door is worn with age.
The sign above the door is brand new.
The sign above the door is clearly broken.
The bottom half of the door is blocked by sand.
There are two guards standing at the entrance.
